name: Unofficialfitbitweightrecorder
0:
”Alexa, tell weight recorder that I weigh 95 kilos”
”Alexa tell weight recorder that I weigh 197 pounds”
”Alexa tell weight recorder that I weigh 15 stone and 3 pounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weight recorder
des:
If you, like me, have a weight that registers weight and bodyfat and want to keep track of it using fitbit, then this is the skill for you.

If you experience issues, don't hesitate to reach out to me soerensejr+alexa@gmail.com
